channel.title: academia on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in academia on David John Baker

item.title: Monte Verità Workshop 2023
item.description: I was fortunate to spend this last week at Monte Verità in Switzerland, attending a workshop on decoding musical structure.

item.title: A Peculiar Anniversary
item.description: Today marks a peculiar anniversary. As of the 2nd of February, for the first time in my life, I have been at the same job for more than a year.

item.title: Ta ta, Goldsmiths; Hallo, Amsterdam
item.description: Today is my last day working as a Postdoc in the Department of Psychology at Goldsmiths, University of London.
